name: Jumping Peppers
description:
This game is an action/puzzle platformer. Each character has his own unique abilities, someone else have no one.

The game is still in heavy development. There are only a few playable levels, with a lot of bugs.

CONTROLS (from default pico-8 keys layout)
left, right = move character left, right

down=activate levers and teleport on exit

z = shot (only police pepper)

x = jump (hold down jump to glide with mexican pepper)
a = swap characters
l-shift = restart level
